auth Package¶

authLoginController Module¶

fla.gr controller for authentication login

For more information, see: https://github.com/JoshAshby/

http://xkcd.com/353/

Josh Ashby 2013 http://joshashby.com joshuaashby@joshashby.com

class controllers.auth.authLoginController.authLogin(env, members, sessionID)¶

Bases: utils.baseHTMLObject.baseHTMLObject

GET()¶

Display the login page or redirect to their dashboard if they are already logged in

POST()¶

Use form data to check login, and the redirect if successful if not successful then redirect to the login page again.
